players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
You: "Bob is the mafioso. We can't afford to waste any time; we need to vote him out now."
Bob: "Accusing me outright without proof is reckless, Alice. Let's focus on gathering info before lynching anyone."
You: "Bob is the mafia; I confirmed it last night. We must vote him out immediately to protect the town."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
